Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored the winning goal in the 52nd minute
Others: Croatia pressed from the start, having been beaten 2-1 by Portugal in their Nations League opener on Thursday
Poland barely threatened Croatia's box for the majority of the game
Home goalkeeper Dominik Livakovic only had to intervene following halftime to deny Nicola Zalewski from Poland's first attempt on goal out of two in total
Strikers Igor Matanovic and Robert Lewandowski hit the bar for Croatia and Poland respectively later in the second half
